title: Mac can't connect to the server (PBE)
body:
Hello everybody and riot,
So yesterday and today in the morning for yesterday everything is fine but after the maintenance on pbe when I do a match it says server not connecting and I tried to reconnect which still doesn't work. I even delete and redownload the whole thing and still doesn't work but it work on my normal client any suggestion on fixing it? would be helpful and have a great day{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}  that's how I feel about can't play a match

replies.body: Hey guys, there's currently a ticker up on the [PBE status page. ](https://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) There is a maintenance going on, and they're also looking into Mac issues currently!

I've resolved doing this:

Closed all things forcing

Right click on the game 

Went on LoL App in docs

Right Click on the app, get info

There are privileges. I had ADMIN privileges on only reading. I changed them on Write/Read and the game worked perfectly.

I don't have a lot of visibility on the PBE but it should be running.  See if the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help you out here.  If the issue persists, you may want to post this over at the[ PBE boards](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/) to report.

Me too. Been trying to play since last night. Can't enter any game 
 {{sticker:sg-janna}}
